data.actual_result: Upon joining, your icon will quickly flash green and make the push to talk sound. No audio from mic seems to be transmitted in this time however.
data.expected_result: Upon join, your icon shows no activity (does not go green or hear push to talk bleep sound)
data.short_description: Push to talk activated for a split second upon joining voice channel.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have push to talk enabled in settings - Join a voice channel
